survey_name: Hotel Guest Experience and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from hotel guests about their overall experience, including room comfort, staff service, amenities, and likelihood of returning.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the cleanliness of your room?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with clear radio button options.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the cleanliness of your room?

questions.question_text: Which of the following amenities did you use during your stay? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Consider adding an 'Other' option if additional amenities are not listed.

script.question_text: Which of the following amenities did you use during your stay? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the friendliness and professionalism of the hotel staff?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure service quality. Ensure the scale is consistent with Q1.
